thread.title: Apple Boosts iWork Productivity Apps - NewsFactor
thread.title_full: Apple Boosts iWork Productivity Apps - NewsFactor - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: NewsFactor
title: Apple Boosts iWork Productivity Apps - NewsFactor
text:
Released yesterday, the updates took out of beta Apple's Keynote, Numbers and Pages apps for iCloud. In addition to supporting the latest versions of iOS and OS X -- Apple's Word charts and documents, enables better multitasking during editing and supports Split View on the iPad Pro, iPad Air 2 and iPad mini 4. Meanwhile, new features in the Numbers spreadsheet app for iCloud include previewing of shared documents on iOS and Android browsers.
 NewsFactor.
